p.note: When you run the following command, you are requesting a new set of credentials. You are not retreiving an existing set of credentials. There is no way to retrieve an existing set of credentials.

context.p: To generate a set of credentials:

step.cmd: Get administrator credentials and source eucarc:

info.codeblock: /usr/sbin/euca_conf â€“-get-credentials admin.zip unzip admin.zip source eucarc euca-describe-availability-zones verbose
